name: Roblox Anime Transparency v1.5
description: This is simply the "ROBLOX: Transparency V2" Theme, but with a few changes to the scripting and an added background GIF which was edited by me, from a still wallpaper image. Please enjoy! The anime character in the background is Uta, from Tokyo Ghoul. Credit for Original theme goes to FCEFEAR.
additional_info:
Please note that I do not own everything in this theme. While I have changed quite a few things that I personally enjoy more, and want to upload so that others can also enjoy it, If the creator of the theme I derived this from (FCEFEAR) wants me to take this down then I will do so as soon as possible.
Incase anyone wanted to know, My Roblox username is DrKaric.
